English: Hello, I'm Diogenes, and I'm the solution to all your problems.
Spanish: Hola, soy Diógenes y soy la solución a todos tus problemas.

English: But first, sell me an axe \U0001F604 with a weight of 2 \U0001F60A.
Spanish: Pero primero vendeme un hacha\U0001F604 de peso 2\U0001F60A.

English: Click on the tab with the axe\U0001F604 icon.
Spanish: Haz click en la solapa con forma de hacha\U0001F604.

English: It looks like you need a cutting item\U0001F60D and a handle\U0001F601.
Spanish: Parece que necesitas un objeto cortante\U0001F60D y un mango\U0001F601.

English: Click on select and follow me outside.
Spanish: Dale a seleccionar y sigueme afuera.

English: Let's search in the trash for the items we need.
Spanish: Busquemos en el tacho los objetos necesarios.

English: Press the thrash can to get items.
Spanish: Presiona el basurero para obtener los items.

English: ¡Done! Put them on the conveyor belt and pull the lever.
Spanish: ¡Listo! Ponelos en la cinta transportadora y tirá de la palanca.

English: The items are waiting for us in the workshop
Spanish: Ahora los objetos nos esperan en el taller.

English: Drag the items to the blueprint.
Here, use my hammer to finish that weapon.
Spanish: Usa mi martillo para terminar el arma.

English: All right! Deliver the weapon to the client (that client is me).
Spanish: ¡Listo! Entregá el arma al cliente, o sea, a mí.

English: Now get ready, because there are more customers eager for their weapons.
Spanish: Ahora prepárate, porque hay más clientes ansiosos por sus armas.

English: Remember to keep an eye on the weapon’s total weight, or you’ll receive a smaller tip!
Spanish: Y recordá estar atento al peso total del arma ¡o recibirás menos propina!

English: Oh, one more thing. If the junk starts piling up, just use the pocket vortex I left in the garden.
Spanish: Ah, una cosa más, si tienes problemas con la cantidad de basura puedes usar el vortice de bolsillo que dejé en el jardin
